sentence.Network_en: I was scared by the hullabaloo over my arrival.
sentence.Network_cn: 人声鼎沸的欢迎场面把我吓了一跳。

sentence.Network_en: There are many people who " the moment they alight from the official carriage " make a hullabaloo.
sentence.Network_cn: 有许多人 “ 下车伊始 ”,就哇喇哇喇地发议论.

sentence.Network_en: There was a hullabaloo about it.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(66) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... hull 外壳 hullabaloo 喧嚣 hulled 有壳的.
寓教于乐好去处——上海科技馆_新沪江英语网... ... pettily 卑鄙地,小气地 hullabaloo 喧嚣,喧哗,吵闹 midpoint 中点,正中央.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... vociferous adj． 喧哗的，大叫大嚷的 hullabaloo n 喧嚷声，吵闹声 | pother n 烦恼，喧闹.
文明一点的英文感叹词_百度知道 ... Heaven help me! 惊奇，害怕 hullabaloo 吵闹（声）, （混乱, 骚动）声 Mmmm! 品尝满意.

list.abs: now , if you recall that whole hullabaloo ., 你如果回想起那阵子.
soon after the hunters came up , blowing their horns and making a great hullabaloo .不久后，猎人来了，吹着他们的号角，弄出很大的动静。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: reduplication of hallo, hullo, etc

entry.def: A hullabaloo is a lot of noise or fuss made by people who are angry or excited about something.

example.ex: I was scared by the hullabaloo over my arrival.
example.tran: 人声鼎沸的欢迎场面把我吓了一跳。
